result.question: One of the things I really value in conversation is asking these dumb, simple questions of what is intelligence?
What do you think about someone who spends their life counting blades of grass and doesn't enjoy it?
Within communities, it's a little cluster of people that argue and bicker, but what are they arguing about?
If there is that consciousness base layer, how do you start engineering organisms that have consciousness in them?
How do you know if I give you a thing that that thing is living?
Can you maybe as a therapy session help me figure out what we do here?
How would we ever know what's the ground of the pain is the hardware or the software, really?
What to you is the connection between free will and consciousness and is free will an illusion or not?
The big ridiculous question, what do you think is the meaning of all of this?
